qas.question: What was the median household income in 2013?
What is the name of a wealthy neighborhood?
What is the lowest median income in Philadelphia?

context: According to the Census Bureau, the median household income in 2013 was <a0_0>$36,836<a0_0/>, down 7.9 percent from 2008 when the median household income was $40,008 (in 2013 dollars). For comparison, the median household income among metropolitan areas was $60,482, down 8.2 percent in the same period, and the national median household income was $55,250, down 7.0 percent from 2008. The city's wealth disparity is evident when neighborhoods are compared. Residents in <a1_0>Society Hill<a1_0/> had a median household income of $93,720 while residents in one of North Philadelphia's districts reported the lowest median household income, <a2_0>$14,185<a2_0/>.
